name: Vegan Mushroom Stroganoff
description: This vegan mushroom stroganoff is super easy, decadent, incredibly creamy, and so easy to make! It makes such a great weeknight dinner, but it's also perfect for a nice Sunday family dinner. And it's ready in just 20 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the onion. Heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes until they're translucent. Add the garlic and cook it for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the onion. Heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes until they're translucent. Add the garlic and cook it for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour, the tomato paste, and the paprika powder and stir well. Cook for 2 minutes until lightly brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour, the tomato paste, and the paprika powder and stir well. Cook for 2 minutes until lightly brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Deglaze with white wine and simmer for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Deglaze with white wine and simmer for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the mushrooms and stir well with a wooden spoon so they're covered with the tomato paste onion mixture. Cook on high heat for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add the mushrooms and stir well with a wooden spoon so they're covered with the tomato paste onion mixture. Cook on high heat for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegan sour cream. Season with freshly pressed lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve immediately over pasta or mashed potatoes and sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegan sour cream. Season with freshly pressed lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve immediately over pasta or mashed potatoes and sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley.

keywords: mushroom stroganoff, vegan mushroom stroganoff, vegan stroganoff
